description:
Keith Laijie originally accompanies http://anidb.net/ch6477 [Loran Cehack] as they come to Earth two years prior to the arrival of the Diana Counter forces. While on Earth, Keith takes up an apprenticeship as a baker and soon falls in love with the owners daughter, Verlaine Bond. As the war between the Dianna Counter and Earth Militia escalates, Keith attempts to run the business as neutrally as possible, supplying baked goods to both sides.
Source: Gundam Wikia
name: Keith Laijie
